## Result type

Represents the [result](./ts-utils.iresult.md) of some operation or sequence of operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Result<T> = Success<T> | Failure<T>;
```
**References:** [Success](./ts-utils.success.md)<!-- -->, [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md)

## Remarks

[Success&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.success.md) and [Failure&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.failure.md) share the common contract [IResult](./ts-utils.iresult.md)<!-- -->, enabling commingled discriminated usage.
